room.name: The Beginning Room
room.desc: You are in a dark room. It seems like it is the beginning of the universe! There are pointless instances of whitespace here, like primordial goo.

room.name: The Second Room
room.desc: Things look a bit better here. You see a waterfall ahead in the distance, but the developers will have to decide if you can get to it or not.

item.name: a delicious chocolate chunk cookie
item.short: A delicious cholocate chunk cookie sits here.
item.desc: The cookie has a delicious, gooey smell of freshly-baked dough.

denizen.name: a penguin
denizen.short: A penguin waddles around your feet.
denizen.desc: The penguin is waddling about, looking for attention from wherever it may come. He also appears hungry, perhaps for herring.
